pageContent: Purpose of review: To summarize the literature on the predictors of quality of life (QoL) of patients with prostate cancer (PCa) on active surveillance and to highlight both risk factors of poor QoL and resilience factors that facilitate decision-making and promote adherence to active surveillance.

metaData.source:
Efficacy of unilateral nerve sparing in radical perineal prostatectomy
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/15897694/
